advice-you-may-want-to-consider: You can generate advice now, but for better results add more steps.
assistant-explanation: Responsible AI Companion™ is an assistant which will ask you questions to help you reflect on your data.
confidence-level-warning:
I am sorry, the confidence level is still {{confidence}}. I am conscious we are already up to {{steps}} questions.
Do you want to add more questions? Alternatively, you can generate the report now.
consent-email: By submitting this form I consent for Onepoint Consulting Ltd to process my personal data for reporting purposes.
consultants-explanation: Here are some consultants who can help you in this problem domain.
disclaimer: AI-generated content may be incomplete or misleading. Validate with your domain specialist(s) or arrange a free consultation with a Onepoint Responsible AI expert.

explanation 1: The {{toolName}} will ask you an initial question which you can answer by either selecting one of the pre-defined answers or by typing your own answer.
explanation 2: Here are some pre-defined answers on which you can click to select them:
explanation 3 submit: After clicking on a pre-defined answer, the text will appear in the input field. In order to submit the answer, you will need to click on the "Submit" button.
explanation 4 steps: The {{toolName}} will then ask you a series of follow-up questions. During this process you will see the progress being displayed on the progress indicator with which you can navigate to previous steps.
explanation 5 lightbulb: If you are not sure about the meaning of any question you can click on the light bulb to get an explanation.
explanation 6 session: If you want to extend the session, you can click on the extension icon to extend the session by one step. Please note that the session cannot be extended beyond 14 steps.
explanation 7 end: When you have arrived at the end of your session, you will see a report with the suggested course of action. At this stage you can restart the session using the start icon.
Failed to fetch knowledge graph. Try aga: Failed to fetch knowledge graph. Try again later
fake-suggestion-1: Low-quality data can lead to incorrect insights and poor decision-making.
File was successfully downloaded: The file was successfully downloaded. Please check the download folder
Generating report. This might take 2 to: Generating report. This might take 2 to 3 minutes...
Data Wellness Companion™ is an assistant: The Responsible AI Companion™ is an assistant which will ask you questions to help you reflect on your data
Instruction: confidence-level-descriptio: The smiley icon reflects D-Well’s confidence level based on your answers so far.
Instruction: High confidence – right tim: Good confidence – right time to make recommendations
Instruction: If you are interested in a: If you are interested in a free consultation, please click here
Instruction: Initial question: Let D-Well know your area of interest (scope)
Instruction: monitor-progress-descriptio: The progress bar shows where you are in the Q&A process. You can navigate between questions by clicking or tapping steps on the progress bar.
Instruction: Navigate between questions: Navigate between questions using the progress bar.
Instruction: Open the menu to access to: Open the menu to access the following functions:
Instruction: personalized-report-descrip:
After the Q&A stage is complete, D-Well will generate a report with tailored recommendations. You can access this from the Report tab.

D-Well also creates a Knowledge graph that maps visual relationships between areas covered during the Q&A.
Instruction: suggested-answer-text: Choose a data area to explore by typing your response or selecting a suggested option. You can edit the suggestion before submitting. Tap the send icon to proceed.
Instruction: The initial question to sta: The initial question to start the conversation.
Instruction: The text area that you can: The text area that you can use to reply to the questions.
Instruction: Use this button to submit y: Use this button to submit your response.
Instruction: You can use any suggested a: You can use any suggested answers in this section. You can also select one and edit it or you can combined multiple selected answers too.
Instruction: You will see a smiley on to: You will see a smiley on top of this bar with the internal confidence levels of the tool
interview-steps-update-failed: The interview steps could not be updated to {{sessionSteps}} steps.
interview-steps-updated: The interview steps were updated to {{sessionSteps}} steps.
intro-explanation-1: Responsible AI Companion™ will ask you an initial question which you can answer by either selecting one of the pre-defined answers or by typing your own answer.
intro-explanation-2: After clicking on a pre-defined answer, the text will appear in the input field. In order to submit the answer, you will need to click on the "Submit" button.
intro-explanation-3: Once the initial question is answered, all of the other questions have an option for multiselect answers. One can select / deselect multiple answers.
intro-explanation-4: When you have arrived at the end of your session, you will see a report with the suggested course of action.
intro-explanation-5: You can explore the knowledge graph at the end of the session to get more insights on how topic are related to each other.
intro-thank-you:
We appreciate your time and thank you for sharing your areas of interest for the Clustre Briefing on Data.

Optional:
If you would like to get your customised recommendations report, click or tap "Generate report"
intro-welcome: Responsible AI Companion™ is an assistant which will ask you questions to help you reflect on your data. It will go through a series of questions and then will provide you with a report with recommendations at the end.
It will go through a series of questions: It will go through a series of questions and then will provide you with a report with recommendations at the end.
Mode will be active on new session: Mode will be active on new session

placeholder-start-2: If you want to select more than one area, you will have the opportunity to return and repeat the process.
placeholder-start-3: If none of the 8 data problems match your special needs, feel free to type in a problem specific to you.
